## Basit AÃ§Ä±klama: Hollandaca CÃ¼mle YapÄ±sÄ±

Bu, TÃ¼rkÃ§edeki SO (Ã¶zne-nesne) dÃ¼zeninden farklÄ±dÄ±r, ama pratik yaparak kolayca alÄ±ÅŸÄ±rsÄ±nÄ±z!

## Temel Kurallar: 5 AltÄ±n Kural

### 2. Zamirler (Pronouns)
